message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"schoolbag; a bag for carrying books and school things","sentence":"书包在桌子上。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a schoolbag sitting on top of a classroom desk. The scene includes gentle ruins of a classroom, with books peeking out of the bag. The overall mood is moody yet hopeful, with muted colors and atmospheric lighting. Emphasize the schoolbag as the main focus, center frame.","sentence_translation":"The schoolbag is on the desk."}
